job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Hi, We are have an opportunity for the below job. We will request you to revert back with your resume. Position: Data Scientist Location: Plano TX (Currently Remote – Will be Onsite until the further announcement. Duration: Long Term Job Description: Duties to Perform •	Build proof-of-concept models using a prototype infrastructure •	Bring proof-of-concept models into production using prototype infrastructure •	Communicate shortcomings or improvements to multi-language API for database interaction •	Build proof-of-concept feature engineering batch and streaming jobs •	Create and present Powerpoint decks describing work to both technical and non-technical audiences •	Assist in design and brainstorming sessions for prototype capabilities Required Skill & Experience •	Expert in Azure Cloud (*Machine Learning*: Event Hub/Streaming Analytics, HDI, DB, Azure ML, Azure Log Analytics, Databricks) •	Strong statistics and machine learning fundamentals •	Demonstrated experience putting models into real-time production •	Experience with Python required; R, Scala, and (Java nice to have) •	Experience with Spark DataFrame and SQL API's required.  Spark streaming/structured streaming are nice to have •	Experience with Azure Cloud •	Experience with Databricks(Spark, Delta Lake, MLFlow) •	Experience with H2O Driverless AI •	Experience with Kafka/Azure Event Hub •	Strong Team Player •	Strong problem-solving skills •	Strong communication skills and the ability to describe shortcomings in system design •	A strong desire and ability to learn new tools and technologies. •	Airflow experience is nice to have Technical Environment •	Azure •	SQL / Mongo DB •	Python / Pyspark •	Kafka / EventHub •	Linux and Shell Scripting •	Possibly R, Scala and Java •	Databricks •	Azure data production and consumption tools (Event Hub, Azure Functions, Streaming Analytics, Regards, Suganya What's app :91 9043392040.
